text: Can you please tell me the stock price of Microsoft on 4th February 2022?

output.name: QueryStock
output.description: This API queries the stock price of a given stock.

stock_code.description: The stock code of the given stock.

date.description: The date of the stock price. Format: %Y-%m-%d

stock_price.description: The stock price of the given stock.

text: The stock price of Microsoft on 4th February 2022 was 338.9 dollars.
